taskDescription:
Solve the formula <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

  <mo>=</mo>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <msub>
              <mi>b</mi>
              <mn>1</mn>
            </msub>
          </mrow>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <msub>
              <mi>b</mi>
              <mn>2</mn>
            </msub>
          </mrow>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
    <mn>2</mn>
  </mfrac>
  <mi>h</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A = \frac{{\left( {{b_1}\, +\, {b_2}} \right)}}{2}h</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{b_1}</annotation></semantics></math>
